content: you will need a large eyed sewing needle for finishing you will need a circular needle size us 4 3 5 mm no longer than 16 40 cm you will need 3 buttons approximately 7/9 22 mm and a sharp sewing needle to attach them to the sweater yarn used wool and the gang feeling good a 4 4 5 5 balls b 3 3 4 4 balls c 1 ball for all sizes
